net.kuujo.vertigo.component

Interface Component

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    BasicExecutor, BasicFeeder, BasicWorker, Executor<T>, Feeder<T>, PollingExecutor, PollingFeeder, StreamExecutor, StreamFeeder, Worker
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExecutor, AbstractFeeder, ComponentBase, DefaultBasicExecutor, DefaultBasicFeeder, DefaultBasicWorker, DefaultPollingExecutor, DefaultPollingFeeder, DefaultStreamExecutor, DefaultStreamFeeder

    public interface Component
    A network component.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      InstanceContext getContext()
      Returns the component instance context.

    • Method Detail

      • getContext

        InstanceContext getContext()
        Returns the component instance context. The instance context can be used to retrieve useful information about an entire network.
        Returns:
        The instance context.
